name: XBike Jumping Stunts
description:
XBike Jumping Stunts is the extreme trail Moto bike racing game with crazy stunt and ultimate thrill action. Mini bike racing driver is a unique extreme top bike race and side scrolling Moto thrill adventure. Have you ever dreamed to perform some crazy trail tricky top bike rider stunts racer?
FEATURE
• Multiple dirt bikes to choose from.
• Realistic dirt Moto stunt ramps and stunts.
• Challenging obstacles and hurdles to avoid.
• Improve your powerful riding skills.
• Fast paced action packed game.
• Various challenging levels.
